edge: Gurukant "Guru" Desai is based on Dhirubhai Ambani.
Sujata "Suju" Desai (played by Aishwarya Rai) is based on Kokilaben Ambani.
"Nanaji" Manik Dasgupta (played by Mithun Chakraborty) is based on Pannalal Dasgupta and Ramnath Goenka.
Shyam Saxena (played by R. Madhavan) is based on Swaminathan Gurumurthy.
Meenakshi "Meenu" Saxena (n√©e Gupta) is based on a character named Gupta.
Champa (played by Mallika Sherawat) is a dancer in the song "Mayya Mayya"
Jignesh (played by Arya Babbar) is based on Champaklal Damani.
Arzan Contractor (played by Arjan Bajwa) is based on Ratan Tata.
Contractor (played by Dhritiman Chatterjee) is based on Naval Tata.
